title: 095: Onyx
author: Chris Taylor
description:
Onyx is a snake that is solid af! He moves through the earth quaking the lands while eating dirt – the tunnels left behind are then populated by diglets, thus singlehandled solving the housing crisis of the dirt creatures.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/synspawn), [Paul](http://www.megatenmarathon.com)

For more episodes and the full ranking list visit [Magmar Sucks](http://www.magmarsucks.com) on the web.

For more on the Pokemon in this episode check out their [Bulbapedia page](http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/Onyx)
long_description:
Onyx is a snake that is solid af! He moves through the earth quaking the lands while eating dirt – the tunnels left behind are then populated by diglets, thus singlehandled solving the housing crisis of the dirt creatures.  

Hosts: [Chris](https://twitter.com/DaLiquidSword), [Mark](https://www.twitch.tv/robobobatron), [Aleksandar](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC56emXYp1pHXL2E9SLcYisw), [Ethan](https://twitter.com/synspawn), [Paul](http://www.megatenmarathon.com)
